definitions.definition: Familiar with something through repeated experience; adapted to existing conditions. ( of a person )
examples: I am not accustomed to walk(ing) long distances.
She is getting more and more accustomed to the cold.

definitions.definition: Familiar through use; usual; customary. ( of a thing, condition, activity, etc. )

main_definition: Familiar with something through repeated experience; adapted to existing conditions. ( of a person )
secondary_definitions: Familiar through use; usual; customary. ( of a thing, condition, activity, etc. )
